name: The Greed of the Dwarves
description:
**One day, a tribe of dwarves found an unusual large amount of gems underground and started digging...**

Help the dwarves to reach the gems lying underground. Build their houses, forges and taverns to keep the digging!

_______________

**The Greed of the Dwarves** is a clicker game where you reach the next level by collecting enough gems.

- *Click* the mine in the middle to collect gems manually

- *Select* a building on the top and place it on the grid to build it and increase your productivity

- The **Dig Deeper** button will fill itself and be clickable when you can advance to the next level

**This game has two endings!** The first ending is obvious, the second ending is trickier

_______________

- Programming / Story / Gameplay - @stefan-laimer

- Programming / Art / Music - @cocapasteque
